external_games.name: Gakuen Battle Fishers: Yoky Shiimono wa Tsure

name: Gakuen Battle Fishers: Yoky Shiimono wa Tsure
summary: Gakuen Battle Fishers: Yoky Shiimono wa Tsure is a Sports game, developed by Konami Computer Entertainment Nagoya and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2000.
